definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: 556:a. [[מוּג]]: in view of prevailing fig. use, and of Ar. ma0ja (mwj) be in tumult, commotion, of sea, people, be agitated, perplexed, it is perh. dub. whether melt is orig. meaning; be moved, agitated is usu. poss., and even Am 9:13, Ps 65:11 (both late), where (esp. Am) moistening is suggested, this may be perh. derived fr. agitating, loosening, dissolving.
